text: Wow!!  This is a great deli.  We have had take out from here twice and weren't upset.  The first time we brought home a pizze and it was the closest to a resturant pizza I have made at home.  Our second visit we ordered sandwhiches and again we wre impressed.

If you are looking for great food this is the place to go.  All of the items are made fresh and in store.  This is the only place I have had an eggplant sandwich this good.  They have many items you can take home  for supper.  The next time we have a party I will be ordering trays.
How sad that the only place in town with four stars had to go out of business.  I can't tell you how much I will miss it.
